title: Amethyst Ashe Bow Shimmering Effect
body:
I played a game as Amethyst Ashe on 5.9, and her bow is not shimmering like it did pre-5.9.

Is this an intentional change?  If so, why was the change made?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

[New Ashe changes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/champion-update-ashe-takes-aim-pbe) hit live with the new patch. With her new kit, the shimmer should happen with (Q) is charged. Is this not what you're seeing?

It does the blue-ish shimmer that the page shows, but before the patch, Amethyst Ashe's bow would constantly shimmer, and it was a goldish yellow.

Old Amethyst Ashe:
You can see it demonstrated in this [video](https://youtu.be/2wmdUnlgL-0?t=51).

New Amethyst Ashe:
The shimmer doesn't appear passively on the new Ashe which is understandable, but even with q active the shimmer isn't the cool shiny gold thing seen [here](https://youtu.be/5fNQDNGtun0?t=60).

EDIT:
I did some more digging, I never realized that the shimmer in the first (the pre-5.9) video occurs when Ashe is at full focus stacks.  Still, it would be nice if that shimmer were used still.
